Description.content: The best fourth hitter in the Major league, he can even use the Remington Pipe to hit a home run.
The elite member of the SWAT and has a powerful body, sweeping away all the barriers in front of him and continues to investigate the source of the biohazard.
An intern nurse just graduated from the school tenderly takes care of each survivors and is an indispensable lifeline in the team.
A ruthless sniper, also known as the Death of the battlefield, always carries the deadly automatic firepower.
A sexy policewoman likes the splendid fireworks. Firing all bullet could give her the most pleasure.
A member of the 'Red', which is a government's secret fight organization, and also a sword master can kill the target silently.
He is a ninja from Koga and comes here to find his friend Fire Dragon is also good at powerful and secret Ninpo.
Marine fighter likes to fight against enemies alone and carries various types of heavy weapons and is also known as the God of War in the frontline.
Super warriors affliated to Space agency's Sagittarius Plan uses laser weapon and also carries the future tech high energy particle gun.
Being an advocator of the Dallas pinioneer spirit, Clint is able to take out the bullets from the clip at an unimaginable fast speed.
Affliated to the No.3 biochemistry institute of the company, he is also a spy and carries unknown biochemical equipment.
Being a notorious killer in Dallas, he is very danageous to the public with modified landmine and Remington Pipe.
Through the genetic enhancement, he is raised to execute the special mission. With the help of AI chip planted in his brain, he can control strong firepower to cover the targeted area.
Once an ace agent for the execution of Black Ice project, he lost most of his memory after suffered an accident during the mission,but the part of proficiently operating guns has been kept.

He was a superstar in the Super Bowl and a solid protector for the quarterback. During the way home, he encountered the biochemistry incident, he decisively takes the Gatling to fight for the survivors.

Being an elite of the Delta Force, he provides reliable firesupport to teammates. But his chatty character makes people not only delightful but also annoying. As a mechanical genius, he likes to make different bombs.
The successor of R.Oppenheimer and has an IQ over 200. He is obsessed with Ultra-low temperature phenomenon and likes to freeze the object by using self-made freezing scattergun and freezing device.
As a future star warrior in the next 50 years, he came back from future to the present world after encountered a singular point in the cruising. He carries advanced high-energy weapons.
